title: Garrett Knight Associates: Global Currency War To Escalate (Emery Fine)
text: By Emery Fine Sep 3, 2015 Following last week's devaluation of the Chinese yuan (renminbi), Japan-based investment broker, Garrett Knight Associates, has advised institutional clients that it is tweaking portfolios to reflect the likelihood of an escalation of the global currency war.The firm said that although the response from US and European policymakers had been largely muted, there was an increased chance of similar measures being employed by other emerging market countries to debase their currencies in order to nullify the advantage the yuan now holds in terms of its competitiveness in export markets. "Although we believe that central banks in advanced countries will eventually have little choice but to crank up monetary stimulus, we don't envisage that happening until 2016," said Sean Mannion, Senior Asia Pacific markets strategist at Garrett Knight Associates. "We do, however, believe that countries like South Korea and Japan will weaken their currencies further in order to preserve competitiveness in markets where they compete with China," he added.China's central bank devalued the yuan over two consecutive days and it now trades nearly 4% lower against the US dollar than it did before the move. The currency has appreciated in value against other currencies because it has been pegged to a US dollar which has strengthened significantly in the last few years. Garrett Knight Associates says the devaluation is being touted as being consistent with a desire to allow the yuan to float more freely in the global currency markets even though the competitive advantage it affords will not be entirely unwelcome."China's exports fell 8.3% year on year last month - a weaker currency will help but will also export deflation or falling prices around the world and that could prompt policymakers in the US to take steps to counter the effect. As interest rates are already at zero, the weapon of choice is likely to be more quantitative easing and investors need to be prepared for that," concluded Mannion. About Garrett Knight AssociatesGarrett Knight Associates is a highly specialised international investment management firm. With over a decade's worth of experience in providing our clients with discretionary and advisory portfolio services for private investors, trusts, pension schemes and high net worth investors, we use an expansive array of carefully selected investment products to maintain healthy growth targets.The main pillar of our investment ethos and the issue that separates us from other companies offering investment management services is our commitment to employee excellence, providing you with the highest level of personalised services. All of our staff listen very carefully to our clients' investment aims, with particular attention being paid to their preferences and interests. About the Author
